txt.en: Delwin wishes for you to save the Abominations.

'We cannot kill these Abominations. They were once like us, and many still are. Please, [placeholder], do not harm these people anymore. They have already been through so much.  \n\n'Instead, speak to Knotfist. He will let you see the errors of your ways. Save our twisted kin once and for all from the mass slaughter Blaire desires.'
Delwin wants you to speak with Knotfist and stop the violence.

'I told them all. I knew it. They just want to be left alone. Thank you, [placeholder]. You can walk with a lighter step today. You have stopped the violence for now.\n\n'Let us leave when you are ready, and we will speak at the camp.'
Having heard from the Abomination leader, Knotfist, speak again with Delwin.
Speak with Delwin outside Lhan Colvarn.
'What an incredible act of kindness. Thank you, [placeholder]. Not many would choose the path you followed. You are a shining example to us all.\n\n'Please, take this small token of my appreciation.'
'You help us? You stop the death? You save us? Please? We no want to be killed. We want to be left alone.\n\n'That all.'
